titles.title: Office of Disability Policy Act of 2019
Office of Disability Policy Act of 2019
A bill to establish the Office of Disability Policy in the legislative branch.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Office of Disability Policy Act of 2019
This bill establishes the Office of Disability Policy within the Government Accountability Office to provide Congress, the executive branch, the states, and the public with data and analysis regarding the effects of legislation, regulations, and guidance on individuals with disabilities, their families, and service providers.
